title: Is Breaking Up The New Trend In Silicon Valley?
teaser: Hewlett-Packard and eBay have split their companies into two. Is it the next big thing in Silicon Valley?
contentencoded:
Hewlett-Packard is splitting into two, eBay is spinning off PayPal, and rumors are growing of other tech companies, including Microsoft, splitting themselves as technology races ahead of companies.

Is this the next big thing in tech?

Re/code’s Kara Swisher joins Here & Now’s Sacha Pfeiffer to discuss the trend.

Guest

  • Kara Swisher, co-founder of Re/code. She tweets @karaswisher.
